# Sudoku One9x

Sudoku One9x is a Sudoku puzzle platform from One9x.
Primary experience: browser game at `/game`.

## Canonical Site
- https://sudoku.one9x.org/

## Key Pages
- Home: https://sudoku.one9x.org/
- Play Sudoku (web): https://sudoku.one9x.org/game
- Blog: https://sudoku.one9x.org/blog/
- Privacy Policy: https://sudoku.one9x.org/privacy-policy.html

## Blog Articles
- https://sudoku.one9x.org/blog/how-to-solve-sudoku-fast.html
- https://sudoku.one9x.org/blog/sudoku-strategies-beginners-to-advanced.html
- https://sudoku.one9x.org/blog/daily-sudoku-practice-plan.html
- https://sudoku.one9x.org/blog/sudoku-rules-for-beginners.html
- https://sudoku.one9x.org/blog/how-to-use-candidates-in-sudoku.html
- https://sudoku.one9x.org/blog/sudoku-mistakes-beginners-make.html
- https://sudoku.one9x.org/blog/sudoku-solving-checklist.html
- https://sudoku.one9x.org/blog/how-to-solve-medium-sudoku.html
- https://sudoku.one9x.org/blog/how-to-solve-hard-sudoku.html
- https://sudoku.one9x.org/blog/sudoku-patterns-you-should-know.html
- https://sudoku.one9x.org/blog/offline-sudoku-vs-online-sudoku.html
- https://sudoku.one9x.org/blog/best-time-to-practice-sudoku-daily.html

## Product Summary
- Core gameplay is free
- Optional paid items may be available for extra content
- Multiple puzzle modes
- Daily challenge gameplay
- Offline-ready core gameplay (generated on device)
- Some content/features may require internet access
- Available on web and Android (Google Play)

## Organization
- Name: One9x
- Contact: contact@one9x.org

## Crawling
- robots.txt: https://sudoku.one9x.org/robots.txt
- sitemap.xml: https://sudoku.one9x.org/sitemap.xml
